mapper.select: select oi.id, oi.pid, oi.oid, oi.uid, oi.number, p.id as pid, p.name, p.promotePrice from orderitem oi left join product p on oi.pid = p.id where uid = #{uid} and oid = #{oid}
select oi.id, oi.oid, oi.pid, oi.uid, oi.number, p.id, p.name, p.stock, p.originalPrice, p.promotePrice from orderitem oi left join product p on oi.pid = p.id where oi.uid = #{uid}
select count(*) from orderitem where pid = #{pid}

select oi.id, oi.pid, oi.oid, oi.uid, oi.number, p.id as pid, p.name, p.promotePrice, pi.id, pi.pid, pi.type from orderitem oi left join product p on oi.pid = p.id left join productimage pi on p.id = pi.pid where oi.id = #{id}
select oi.id, oi.pid, oi.oid, oi.uid, oi.number, p.id as pid, p.name, p.promotePrice from orderitem oi left join product p on oi.pid = p.id where oi.oid = #{oid}
mapper.insert: insert into orderitem (pid, oid, uid, number) values ( #{pid}, #{oid}, #{uid}, #{number} )
